## cancelAfter

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/context/environment.ts" sourceLine="264" packageName="commandkit" />

Cancels a deferred function registered with `after`.



*Example*

```ts
import { cancelAfter } from 'commandkit';
// inside a command
export const chatInput: ChatInputCommand = async (ctx) => {
const id = after(() => {
console.log('This will run after the command has finished executing.');
});

// cancel the deferred function if needed
if (something) cancelAfter(id);
}
```

```ts title="Signature"
function cancelAfter(id: string): void
```
Parameters

### id

<MemberInfo kind="parameter" type={`string`} />
